panel.copy: Bring the fight to your enemies with the Legendary Assault Vehicle
Capable of targeting multiple enemies at once, this unit excels at taking out groups of targets.
Upgrade this unit with upgrade tokens earned from this base.

parameters.loc: All range mode fellas, looks like we're in for it now.
These pitiful forces are nothing. We'll crush them and be home for dinner.
...uh, how are you so sure? Maybe they have special armor... or reinforcments?
Easy Turbo, there's only so much worrying a person can do.
Exactly, besides, our scanners tell us this should be a breeze.
Let's rain down some fire on these poor sods!
Engines are primed for a flyby, lets blast em!
Don't worry guys, I'm uh, right behind you!

panel.copy: Defeat this Kixmas base to earn 5 Kixmas Tokens!
After each win, the daily base will get more challenging.
Visit the Kixmas store to spend Kixmas tokens!
Living up to its legacy, the Legendary Phantom is an incredibly powerful offensive Unique unit.
This High Altitude unit drops devastating explosives onto its enemies with lethal results.
Collect 8 parts to unlock the Legendary Phantom!

parameters.loc: Here comes the Legendary Phantom... and some reinforcements!
Prototype has power. Weapons systems activated. Anti-air measures activated. This is now Pegasus airspace.
Raptors are incoming. Recommend retreating our forces or commanding them to stay near the Pegasus protoype.
Commander, this seems to be the last of the hostile backup.
Clear the path to the Command Center by using the Pegasus prototype to destroy any remaining floating defenses.
A massive air squadron has been redirected to this location. Capture the Pegasus prototype to help fend them off.

panel.copy: The first High Altitude defensive Unique unit, the Pegasus is capable of ravaging air targets that get within its reach.
If the Pegasus prototype is released here, it should easily destroy all air forces present.
Defeating this base unlocks the Pegasus II Base, which can award Pegasus Parts and Tech!

parameters.loc: Commander, I have analyzed the Shadow Alliance map pieces we have acquired.
From what I can piece together, this is the location marked out.
I am confused though, it would appear that a large number of...
... Sarkis'... appear to be guarding the site.
They are clones. This must be where Sarkis was testing out his equipment.
They appear to be inactive.
Without Sarkis provided direction, they do not know what to do.
So they will remain still.
I would advise caution, Commander, as we investigate the area.
Those clones may still provide a threat.
No, I believe they are harmless.
Early model clones.
If they were dangerous, Sarkis would have had them fighting alongside him.
Still, RUBI is correct. Caution is advised.
Commander, the Sarkis clones are advancing on us.
Also, I am receiving a message from...
... Sarkis.
Hello, Commander... and I imagine Shadow is with you as well.
You've come seeking something, but the only thing you will find here is your death.
These clones aren't top of the line, but they are more than capable of doing the job.
Goodbye, Commander.
A trap, Commander. Another trap.
I was able to home in on the signal, however, Shadow.
I am sure it's another trap, but we must follow.

panel.copy: The Screamer is a deadly defensive Unique unit, specifically catered to counter fast moving air attackers.
Along with being able to Mark 5 targets and an inert air attack resistance, the Screamer also broadcasts a battlefield wide signal that reduces all enemy air speed.
Each victory grants Screamer parts or Tech. Collect 8 parts to unlock the Screamer!

parameters.loc: All range mode fellas, looks like we're in for it now.
These pitiful forces are nothing. We'll crush them and be home for dinner.
...uh, how are you so sure? Maybe they have special armor... or reinforcments?
Easy Turbo, there's only so much worrying a person can do.
Exactly, besides, our scanners tell us this should be a breeze.
Let's rain down some fire on these poor sods!
Engines are primed for a flyby, lets blast em!
Don't worry guys, I'm uh, right behind you!

panel.copy: Defeat this Kixmas base to earn 10 Kixmas Tokens!
After each win, the daily base will get more challenging.
Visit the Kixmas store to spend Kixmas tokens!

parameters.loc: Nothing works. Everything I try to change doesn’t make a difference. Nothing stops it.
Talking to yourself? Mind if I sit and hear what you have to say?
You’re an anomaly.
I’ve been called worse.
I don’t know your future. You only join Equinox in this timeline. We never meet you after landing on Earth in the other timelines.
Well I’m happy to be here now. It makes sense I’m here though, and that we’re friends.
We’re both outsiders. I’m not born Equinox. You’re…well you’re going through some things.
You clearly don’t feel like you’re needed here. Or rather, this time.
If I can change the right things, I can guarantee the correct outcome. Is it not worth my life to make that happen?
But you said yourself, nothing you do in the past seems to matter.
I have no idea why I’m not in these timelines you’ve been to, but I know I’m in this one. I’m doing what I can now.
There are a lot of things I did in the past I wish I could change. Now, I can’t jump through time like you…
…But I can walk in the present and do what I can to make up for the past.
Maybe right here, right now, is where you’re supposed to be. Like me. That’s how we change the future.
Wave 1 Complete!
Wave 2 Complete!
Wave 3 Complete!

panel.copy: This Iridium Facility is under assault!
The Armored Corps want this new resource to plate their tanks.
Defeat their waves of attack and be rewarded with Iridium!

parameters.loc: This is a scout trigger!
This is a scout trigger!
This you can eat. See that? You can eat. This?
That’s a pine cone.
Don’t eat. Toilet paper.
That you can eat.
That’s a rock. I’m not eating a rock.
Moss on rock can eat.
Are you going to tell us we can eat this stick next?
Eat stick? No. Idiot. That toothbrush.
Of course it is.

panel.copy: This Operation's Incursions are limited to Sentinels and FACTIONLESS units!
Intel suggests using the Vesper to great effect.
Complete all 3 Incursions to earn the Incursion XP Set bonus!

parameters.loc: All range mode fellas, looks like we're in for it now.
These pitiful forces are nothing. We'll crush them and be home for dinner.
...uh, how are you so sure? Maybe they have special armor... or reinforcments?
Easy Turbo, there's only so much worrying a person can do.
Exactly, besides, our scanners tell us this should be a breeze.
Let's rain down some fire on these poor sods!
Engines are primed for a flyby, lets blast em!
Don't worry guys, I'm uh, right behind you!

panel.copy: Defeat this Kixmas base to earn 10 Kixmas Tokens!

Visit the Kixmas store to spend Kixmas tokens!
The Executioner is an indomitable defensive Unique unit created in honor of the Machine God.
Able to fire 16 shots at a single target, any unit it focuses on is in peril. Overwhelming this unit with swarms or drones will be key.
Collect 8 parts to unlock the Executioner!

parameters.loc: I hate having to get up early for Survival Training.
Yeah. This guy is supposed to be nuts too.
It’s freezing too. Got a smoke?
Yeah. Last two.
You dead.
Holy crap! Where did you come from?
Good Sniper see hot cherry from 3 mile.
Don’t sneak up on people, you pirate ghost looking psycho.
You are all ghost. I just haven’t killed you yet.
What the hell, dude?

panel.copy: This Operation's Incursions are limited to Sentinels and FACTIONLESS units!

parameters.loc: All range mode fellas, looks like we're in for it now.

...uh, how are you so sure? Maybe they have special armor... or reinforcments?
Easy Turbo, there's only so much worrying a person can do.
Exactly, besides, our scanners tell us this should be a breeze.
Let's rain down some fire on these poor sods!
Engines are primed for a flyby, lets blast em!
Don't worry guys, I'm uh, right behind you!

panel.copy: Defeat this Kixmas base to earn 10 Kixmas Tokens!

parameters.loc: Nothing works. Everything I try to change doesn’t make a difference. Nothing stops it.
Talking to yourself? Mind if I sit and hear what you have to say?
You’re an anomaly.
I’ve been called worse.
I don’t know your future. You only join Equinox in this timeline. We never meet you after landing on Earth in the other timelines.
Well I’m happy to be here now. It makes sense I’m here though, and that we’re friends.
We’re both outsiders. I’m not born Equinox. You’re…well you’re going through some things.
You clearly don’t feel like you’re needed here. Or rather, this time.
If I can change the right things, I can guarantee the correct outcome. Is it not worth my life to make that happen?
But you said yourself, nothing you do in the past seems to matter.
I have no idea why I’m not in these timelines you’ve been to, but I know I’m in this one. I’m doing what I can now.
There are a lot of things I did in the past I wish I could change. Now, I can’t jump through time like you…
…But I can walk in the present and do what I can to make up for the past.
Maybe right here, right now, is where you’re supposed to be. Like me. That’s how we change the future.
Present Day…
AHHHHHH!!!
Are you okay?
What did you have for breakfast?
What does that have to do with…
WHAT DID YOU HAVE FOR BREAKFAST?!
Whoa. Eggs and toast
I’m back. How long was I gone?
A few seconds. But these readings are saying it was 10 days. Where were you?
I don’t know. I can’t remember. It’s like waking up from a dream.
There are things I remember, but things that don’t make sense.
Bzzzzzz. Bzzzz. Bzzzzzzzz
You’re going to run out of space on your arms soon. Also, is tattooing yourself really the best way to take notes?
It’s the only way to ensure I have the information in case I jump to a different timeline.
Different Timeline? Minuet, In the last year you’ve aged more than a decade. You’re covered in ink.
You think I need a break. We have this conversation in 12 different instances. I’m fine. Fire it up again.
All range mode fellas, looks like we're in for it now.
These pitiful forces are nothing. We'll crush them and be home for dinner.
...uh, how are you so sure? Maybe they have special armor... or reinforcments?
Easy Turbo, there's only so much worrying a person can do.
Exactly, besides, our scanners tell us this should be a breeze.
Let's rain down some fire on these poor sods!
Engines are primed for a flyby, lets blast em!
Don't worry guys, I'm uh, right behind you!

panel.copy: Defeat this Kixmas base to earn 20 Kixmas Tokens!
After each win, the daily base will get more challenging.
Visit the Kixmas store to spend Kixmas tokens!
Overwhelm your enemies with the Legendary Hovertank.
Capable of avoiding damage from mines, this unit can assault bases without concern.
Upgrade this unit with upgrade tokens earned from this base.

parameters.loc: Wave 1 Complete!

It has immense range but it also has a minimum range, so get in close to avoid its damage.
Collect 8 parts to unlock the Judge!

Visit the Kixmas store to spend Kixmas tokens!

parameters.loc: The previous location was a ruse then?
Yes, RUBI. One last manipulation by Sarkis.
However, after searching the area, we did find where the real location was.
Once again guarded by Sarkis clones.
He was determined to get the tech right, RUBI.
He was so close...
Perhaps we should...
RUBI? What is it?
I had detected a weird energy signal, but only for a brief moment.
Sarkis was using quite a lot of Onyx based tech.
I would not be surprised to hear that your systems may be affected.
With that said, it is time to find out what secret Sarkis was trying to hide here...
What is happening here?!
Damn these clones!
It is over, Sarkis!
You cannot run anymore.
You know, Shadow... I knew it would be you.
If someone was to stop me, it was going to be you.
To be honest, I wouldn't have had it any other other way...

panel.copy: Spruce up your vehicles with a new coat of paint!
Random roll to earn new Warpaint maxbuildables or Bonus Thorium!
Only Cosmortars, Canons, Centaurs, and their Heroes can enter!

parameters.loc: Viper X reinforcements!  They will hit him with Corrosive ammo, but instead of damaging him, it seems to be... strengthening him?!
Wave 1 Complete!
Wave 2 Complete!
Wave 3 Complete!

panel.copy: Control the skies with the Legendary Hellstorm.
Capable of targeting both air and ground, this unit excels at destroying fortifications.
Upgrade this unit with upgrade tokens earned from this base.

parameters.loc: Unidentified forces, we are tracking you closing in on our location.
If you proceed on your current course, we'll have to assume hostile intent and we'll be forced to open fire.
Turn around before you face the full strength of the entire Chopper Company!
Unidentified forces, this is your last chance.
Turn around now before you're destroyed.
Alpha Battalion, you are clear to engage hostile bogeys.
Bravo Battalion, the air is yours.
Charlie Battalion, finish this fight!
You've won this fight but this is far from over!
One Year Ago…
…I believe that the application of this compact tachyon mobile temporal engine…
…Problems of the past…Well, they’ll be a thing of the past.
With the coming threat, as long as we keep this engine in tact, we’ll always be able to change the past.
In addition, the applications of this technology are endless.
We could theoretically affect time in localized areas, giving us unheard of tactical advantages.
I know resources are scarce, and we’re still trying to get are feet back after returning to Earth…
…But this is our plan B. This is how we ensure that through the past we guarantee a future.

panel.copy: The Kraken is a deadly defensive Unique unit capable of devastating any targets that get within its reach.
A Kraken prototype is held within this location. Unleash the Kraken and destroy all forces here!
Defeating this base unlocks the Kraken II Base, which can award Kraken Parts and Tech!

parameters.loc: Detecting hostiles converging on this location. Recommend retreating our troops to test the Kraken's true potential.
All range mode fellas, looks like we're in for it now.
These pitiful forces are nothing. We'll crush them and be home for dinner.
...uh, how are you so sure? Maybe they have special armor... or reinforcments?
Easy Turbo, there's only so much worrying a person can do.
Exactly, besides, our scanners tell us this should be a breeze.
Let's rain down some fire on these poor sods!

After each win, the daily base will get more challenging.
Visit the Kixmas store to spend Kixmas tokens!
The Pegasus is a slow moving platform with the ability to quickly track nearby aircraft.
With its powerful mounted machine guns, the Pegasus can quickly light up all enemy aircraft, including the fastest jets.
Each victory grants Pegasus parts or Tech. Collect 8 parts to unlock the Pegasus!

parameters.loc: Smell that?
I haven’t been able to feel my nose, let alone smell for the last 6 hours.
It bear. Grizzly. Smell bear shit.
You can smell that? So what do we do?
Whoa, where’d Simo go?
Not cool, dude.
Shit, there it is. It’s coming right for us?
What do we do? Run?
I don’t know. He didn’t tell us. He’d probably say to wrestle with it and be brothers.
Or to become the bear, or some other bullshit.
BANG!
It dead. More dinner.
How the hell did you get 30 feet high in a tree?
I think I can smell the bear shit now.
I think that’s me. Sorry.

panel.copy: This base contains a High Value Target. Killing it is optional!
Killing the High Value Target makes the base pay out more XP.
If you wait too long, the High Value Target will escape.

parameters.loc: All range mode fellas, looks like we're in for it now.
These pitiful forces are nothing. We'll crush them and be home for dinner.
...uh, how are you so sure? Maybe they have special armor... or reinforcments?

Exactly, besides, our scanners tell us this should be a breeze.
Let's rain down some fire on these poor sods!

panel.copy: Defeat this Kixmas base to earn 10 Kixmas Tokens!

Visit the Kixmas store to spend Kixmas tokens!

parameters.loc: So, Simo, did we pass Survival Training?
Yeah, do we have what it takes to be one of your Frostpiercers?
Failed.
What? That means we’re going to have to do the training again.
C’mon, man. What do we have to do to pass?
I burned down half a forest once, so I can kinda build a fire.
You lack…required skills. Required…abilities.
We can learn.
Yeah, we’re probably smarter than we appear.
Simo, come back to the fire!
Yes, Simo. We’re so cold.
You do not qualify. You lack most important quality.
Dude, you’re an animal.
Maybe they have room for us at that fire?
Nah. They’d eat us alive.

panel.copy: This base contains a High Value Target. Killing it is optional!
Killing the High Value Target makes the base pay out more XP.
If you wait too long, the High Value Target will escape.
Living up to its legacy, the Legendary BFG is an incredibly powerful offensive Unique unit.
Rock your foes from afar with this Artillery's staggering range and devastating Rolling Splash.
Collect 8 parts to unlock the Legendary BFG!
After years dormant, the Legion program is resurrected to bring you a stalwart base asaulter.
While devastating on its own, the Legendary Legion brings two clones to the battle for ultimate destruction.
Collect 8 parts to unlock the Legendary Legion!

parameters.loc: All range mode fellas, looks like we're in for it now.

The Kraken is a deadly defensive Unique unit, specifically catered to counter large groups of base attackers all at the same time.
Able to target 16 enemies at once, the Kraken devastates all within its range. Along with the Judge's extreme range,  these uniques have all bases covered!
Each victory grants Kraken parts or Tech. Collect 8 parts to unlock the Kraken!

panel.copy: This Iridium Facility is under assault!
The Armored Corps want this new resource to plate their tanks.
Defeat their waves of attack and be rewarded with Iridium!

parameters.loc: We’ve been laying in the snow for 6 hours, my balls are freezing, and I don’t think he’s blinked once.
He’s just eating snow like its mashed potatoes.
BANG!
Warn a person, dude.
Snow mask breath. We now have dinner. Come.
I’ll be honest, I didn’t even see this deer.
You’re not even using a scope. That was like 500 yards away.
You don’t look for deer. Hear for deer. Smell for deer.
Pretty sure you can look for them too.
See steam from wound. This deer spirit. Breath it in.
I’m good.
You are not good.
That’s cold, man.

panel.copy: This Operation's Incursions are limited to Sentinels and FACTIONLESS units!
Intel suggests using the Vesper to great effect.
Complete all 3 Incursions to earn the Incursion XP Set bonus!

parameters.loc: We need to talk, Minuet.
You’re going to say that my obsession with changing the past is slowly killing me.
You’re going to say that none of my research has suggested I can actually make changes to the past.
You’re going to say that I have not delivered on the military applications I’ve promised.
You’re going to say that you’re going to pull me from the project…
…To which I tell you that none of these delays will matter once I’ve solved the problems.
While I appreciate you having this conversation for me, when’s the last time you looked in a mirror?
IT DOESN’T MATTER! None of this will matter unless I can stop what’s coming!
You can’t stop what’s coming if you’re dead, or even more likely seeing you now, have gone insane.
I’m pulling you from the project, which I’m sure you knew I was going to say…
…But like with most things right now, it’s a reality you don’t want to accept.
You’re making a mistake.
Maybe, but you’re more important to Equinox here and now then you are lost in time.
Dismissed.
Wave 1 Complete!
Wave 2 Complete!
Wave 3 Complete!
All range mode fellas, looks like we're in for it now.
These pitiful forces are nothing. We'll crush them and be home for dinner.
...uh, how are you so sure? Maybe they have special armor... or reinforcments?
Easy Turbo, there's only so much worrying a person can do.
Exactly, besides, our scanners tell us this should be a breeze.
Let's rain down some fire on these poor sods!

Don't worry guys, I'm uh, right behind you!

parameters.loc: Wave 1 Complete!
Great Work Commander, 2 more waves left!
Wave 2 Complete!
Almost there Commander, 1 more wave left!
Wave 3 Complete!
Mission Accomplished. I knew you had it in you!
Hey there Commander, welcome to the good fight. I've been tasked with getting you up to speed.
My name's Conrad, and this is Basic Training. Defend against waves of enemies to survive.
You'll be given yellow crates to bolster your forces. Walk over these crates to collect them, otherwise they expire.
There are also red crates. Each red crate you collect is worth 200 Event XP.
Good luck Commander, I'm sure you'll do just fine.

panel.copy: Welcome Commander, you will report to Conrad Howard, a Rangers liaison.
Complete Basic Training to set yourself up for the Operation ahead.
Survive against 3 waves of enemies to gain victory.

parameters.loc: This is a scout trigger!
This is a scout trigger!

These pitiful forces are nothing. We'll crush them and be home for dinner.
...uh, how are you so sure? Maybe they have special armor... or reinforcments?
Easy Turbo, there's only so much worrying a person can do.
Exactly, besides, our scanners tell us this should be a breeze.
Let's rain down some fire on these poor sods!

panel.copy: Defeat this Kixmas base to earn 10 Kixmas Tokens!
After each win, the daily base will get more challenging.
Visit the Kixmas store to spend Kixmas tokens!

parameters.loc: Redirect power to the production sites. Let's end this before it even begins.
Power levels holding steady. Drone production ready for your approval.
Start drone production.
Ma'am, drone production nearing critical levels.
Fine. Halt drone production to cool down.
Drone production is stable again. We're ready at your signal.
Begin.
Drone production nearing critical levels.
Halt drone production to cool down.
Activating drone production.
Ceasing drone production.
The prototype! Shadow is not going to like this.
Strange. There's not supposed to be any Corpus activity in this area.
RUBI, any idea what we're looking at here?
This may be one of their research black sites.
Heavily used in our initial hostilities with them, Corpus has since been much more open about their research.
Until today it seems...
Commander, I'm detecting multiple signals emanating from within this location.
This signal is quite unlike anything I've seen so far.
Attempting to narrow down the source.
Are those drones...running this entire site? I didn't think Corpus had that type of technology.
We didn't... until recently.
Nyx, what is going on here? Are those drones really maintaining this whole base by themselves?
It took many iterations but yes, this site is almost entirely autonomous at this point.
We had years of testing drones with individuality, but all ended in failure.
Drones would be completely oblivious to their platoon's status.
They still needed a helping hand. Some guidance. With that, we made a brain.
Now, an entire battalion can be run by one or two soldiers.
We call it the HIVE.
Commander, the signals are all originating from the HIVE prototype.
In addition, I believe every drone here is preparing for combat.
Readying our forces for imminent hostilities.
Commander, you're not supposed to be here.
I really wish you hadn't seen any of this.
You know we can't just let you reveal this technology to the world.
The HIVE is the source of the signal.
We destroy that and we may have a shot of getting out of here alive.
